productDescription: The Frogg Toggs Classic Pro Action Rain Pant is perfect for hunting, fishing, jogging, hiking, biking, camping and many more outdoor activities. The pants feature an adjustable, elastic waist that allows for a customized and secure fit. The expanded 4" back rise ensures the pants will fit under any rain jacket for overall coverage to keep you dry. Oversized leg openings with hook-and-loop adjustments allow the pant to fit easily over your favorite pair of rain boots or shoes, providing a level of convenience you’ll only experience with Frogg Toggs. Welcome to Frogg Toggs. We believe that premium materials, exceptional construction and innovative features should be standard and still affordable. We work hard to get you the fit and performance you need for your active lifestyle.

The material features the same durable construction, but now with added two-way stretch for extra comfort and mobility in any position. A crotch gusset has also been added for a non-binding action fit when walking, kneeling, or sitting. productName: Red Kap Men's Stain Resistant, Flat Front Work Pants
describe: CLASSIC COMFORT: This soft & durable cotton/poly twill pant has a wrinkle-resistant finish for minimal ironing. It features a heavy-duty hidden brass ratcheting zipper & covered buttons, 2 slack style pockets & two set-in hip pockets with button closures
productDescription: Red Kap Mens Work Pants. Since 1923, we’ve proudly designed workwear with comfort and durability in mind for construction, maintenance, waste management, transportation, and all other hard-working trades. Red Kap Workwear. The Done Right Guarantee: PROVEN DURABILITY. Red Kap challenges industry experts to put our workwear to the test. We test, tweak, and repeat until it's Done Right. COMFORT. Comfortable fabric and a regular fit free you to bend and move with ease, even in tight-spaces and difficult conditions. FUNCTION. Engineered with: Touchtex-Pro Technology for breathable comfort, strong colors and stain-resistance. Durable Press wrinkle-resistant finish for minimum pressing or ironing. TruBlack Fabric resists fading, wash after wash. Covered Buttons. Hidden Zippers. Two (2) Slack-Style front pockets Two (2) Set-In hip pockets, button-closure. CLEAN-ABILITY. With each wash, the stain-resistant fabric releases soil, dirt and grease, all while retaining its original color and comfortable fit. DESIGNED WITH PRIDE. Red Kap Workwear is geared for the garage, crafted for the carmakers, and perfect for any job requiring some elbow grease. Join the 16 million American workers who go to work wearing Red Kap.

productName: Helly-Hansen Mens Dubliner Waterproof Windproof Rain Pant
describe: Great-fitting and versatile waterproof pants with quick-dry lining.
productDescription: A great-fitting, versatile Helly tech jacket for men. Featuring a waterproof, breathable and windproof fabric, fully seam sealed protection, and a quick-dry lightweight lining add to the comfort in both warm and cold weather. founded in Norway in 1877, Helly Hansen continues to develop their apparel through a blend of Scandinavian design and insights drawn from living among some of the harshest environments on earth. The brand represents the optimal combination of performance, protection and style. The company has a long list of first-to-market innovations including the first supple, waterproof fabrics more than 130 years ago, the first fleece fabrics in the 1960s, the first technical base layers made with Lifa stay dry technology in the 1970s and today's award winning and patented h2flow temperature regulating technology. Helly Hansen is the global leader in technical sailing apparel.  its ski uniforms are worn by more than 50,000 professionals across 100+ski resorts and mountain guiding operations around the world, as well as national ski teams, Olympians and discerning outdoor enthusiasts. Technically engineered and real-world tested, all Helly Hansen garments are fully warranted against defects in materials and workmanship. Should any garment's key features or functions fail due to a manufacturing defect, we will repair it without charge or provide a replacement.  all Helly Hansen technical outerwear garments (Helly tech, Helly tech xp and Helly tech O2) are covered by a limited lifetime warranty, this policy does not cover normal wear and tear on the product.

Wear with care.At Buffalo, each piece of fashion we make moves us forward. productName: Columbia Men's Silver Ridge Cargo Pant
describe: OMNI-WICK: The ultimate moisture management technology for the outdoors. Omni-Wick quickly moves moisture from the skin into the fabric where it spreads across the surface to quickly evaporate—keeping you cool and your clothing dry.
productDescription: A durable, sweat-wicking trail pant built to keep you comfortable and protected in a wide variety of conditions and activities. Our Men’s Silver Ridge Cargo Pants feature built-in UPF 50 protects you from the sun’s damaging rays during long hours outdoors, and a gusseting detail facilitates great fit and mobility. Advanced technology and functional design make for a great experience. Whether you're out for hours of hiking, or just sitting back catching the view, these pants will not disappoint. The protective Omni-SHADE exterior features UPF 50 to help block and shield from UVA and UVB sun rays, while the Omni-WICK material wicks away moisture and perspiration for dry and comfortable wear all day. For a laid-back daytime look, try a slightly scrunched leg and sneakers. Once night rolls around, try a 2-inch cuff with a Chelsea boot. Every drop counts, so we aim to use less water. Our designers are constantly thinking of new ways to create the same styles you love while cutting back on H2O, such as updating finishing techniques to require less water than traditional processes. These slim jeans are made using our WaterLess techniques.

The 3301 is a classic 5-pocket jean and represents the cleanest style in the G-Star denim range. Based on the classic workwear jean known for its ‘non-fit’, the 3301 is a wardrobe staple. Its name is derived from the fabric and color code of the first raw denim introduced by G-Star in 1996. Slim Fit: Tight waist, short rise front, regular rise back, tight from thigh to hem. Sustainable sulphur dye method from DyStar. This jean is RAW Sustainable. RAW Sustainable garments are made of materials that contribute towards minimizing the environmental impact of the G-Star collection. By buying cotton products from G-Star Raw, you're supporting more sustainable cotton farming through the Better Cotton Initiative.

productDescription: SITKA GEAR MEN'S DEW POINT HUNTING PANT The 3-layer GORE-TEX Dew Point Pant offers waterproof protection when you’re three days in and the clouds turn black. Minimally featured—including micro-taped seams and zero pockets—it’s made from a 20D nylon ripstop face with GORE C-KNIT Backer Technology for easy movement and compressibility in the mountains. Two-way side zips offer easy on/off and venting; the articulated fit won’t tug when you’re navigating rough country or hiking in the rain. FEATURES: - 100% waterproof/breathable 3-layer GORE-TEX 20D nylon ripstop face for ultralight/durable protection from talus-strewn ridges - 20D nylon ripstop face hits the sweet spot by delivering lightweight protection and durability - Pliant, packable GORE C-KNIT Backer Technology for comfort, reduced weight and quiet performance - YKK 7/8-length side zips vent for dumping heat and easy on/off with boots on - Micro-taped seams for weather protection with minimal bulk - Minimal failure points for long-last performance - Adjustable nylon web belt

With reinforced stitching and a triple-stitched inseam, these Coveralls are built to last. But functionality doesn't come at the expense of style. The Portwest S999 Men's Coverall features a modern, tapered fit that looks great in any setting. The Coveralls are available in a range of colors, so you can choose the option that best suits your personal style or work uniform requirements. These Coveralls are also designed with practicality in mind. The Portwest S999 Men's Coverall features multiple pockets, including two front pockets, two rear pockets, and a side leg cargo pocket. This provides ample storage space for all your tools and personal items, keeping them close at hand when you need them. In addition, the Portwest S999 Men's Coverall features an adjustable waistband, allowing you to find the perfect fit for your body type. This ensures maximum comfort and ease of movement, no matter how long you need to wear the Coveralls. If you're looking for a versatile and durable workwear solution, the Portwest S999 Men's Coverall is an excellent choice. With its blend of comfort, durability, and style, these Coveralls are perfect for a range of applications, from construction and manufacturing to transportation and logistics.

Insect Shield is Insect repellent you'll love to wear
productDescription: The Insect Shield Men's Heavy Duty Outdoor Work Cargo Pants, engineered to keep you comfortable and protected during demanding outdoor tasks. Crafted with durability in mind, these pants are made from rugged, heavy-duty fabric that withstands rough conditions while ensuring unrestricted movement. Key Features: • Insect Shield Technology: Repels mosquitoes, ticks, ants, flies, chiggers, and midges to protect you from insect bites and potential diseases. • Durable Fabric: Designed for tough outdoor environments, these pants resist abrasions and tears, making them ideal for rugged activities like landscaping, construction, and camping. • Cargo Pockets: Multiple pockets provide ample storage for tools and essentials, keeping them easily accessible throughout your workday. • Comfortable Fit: Built with a relaxed fit and articulated knees for enhanced mobility and comfort during extended wear. • UPF Protection: Offers sun protection with a UPF 30+ rating to shield your skin from harmful UV rays. Whether you're working in the yard, hiking through dense woods, or tackling construction projects, the Insect Shield Men's Heavy Duty Outdoor Work Cargo Pants are your reliable companion for staying protected and productive outdoors.

True to our beliefs, we are rebellious, unapologetic and strive for world domination. ✔We outfit our troops to live an indestructible lifestyle. ✔We know there is strength in numbers. ✔We believe our culture will never fit in. ✔We remain united in our beliefs. Started sometime around 1998 or 1999 by Brian Deegan and Larry Linkogle, Metal Mulisha has grown into the biggest, best and most bad-ass Freestyle Motocross team in the world. We sell clothes, too. Known for winning gold medals, breaking world records, and turning industry tradition upside down through the sport of freestyle motocross, the godfathers Brian Deegan and Larry Linkogle are back at the helm of Metal Mulisha. What began as a group of friends riding dirt bikes in Metal Mulisha gear and competing to see who could do the best tricks has grown into one of the most recognized and respected brands in action sports. Metal Mulisha’s winning form in freestyle competitions like the X-Games has helped spread the brand’s message to a growing audience around the world.

productName: Ariat mens M5 Slim Stackable Straight Leg Jeans
describe: Straight leg
productDescription: Made for hard working men, this pair of Stackable Straight Leg Jeans are the right choice to carry out your work without any worries of ruining your clothes. These jeans are made of medium-wash denim which is constructed from cotton fabric. The denim is hand-sanded and is whiskered with leg chevrons, tacking knee hotspots, and abrasions to give these jeans a durable design that can withstand all kinds of work conditions including a construction site, farm, and barn. Cowboys can wear them with their traditional western boots and stack them up to create over-the-boot silhouettes. The handcrafted pocket designs with embroidered stitching further add another characteristic to the jeans. Other features of these jeans for men include back pockets with mixed-technique stitching, no-rub comfort inseams, anchored belt loops, reinforced pockets, and heavy-duty zippers and hardware. The jeans are uniquely faded and finished and are easy to wash.

Columbia offers these shorts in multiple staple colors, lengths and extended sizes. To ensure the size you choose is just right, please refer to our sizing chart and abide by the following measurement instructions: To find your waist measurement, measure around your natural waistline. And for your inseam measurement, measure from the top of the interior leg to the end of the knee.

We also know that what's needed to get the job done is always changing, so our footwear and apparel are always evolving, engineered with technologies to proved the very best in comfort, durability and performance - all day long. While Timberland PRO Work Apparel looks great on the job, it's the details that make them really stand out. From moisture-wicking fabrics that feel great against the skin, to tagless neck labels and hidden cell phone pockets, we've built in quality from head to toe.

customersSay: Customers like the fit, quality, and appearance of the pants. They mention they hold up well, are a good brand, and look good. Some say the pants are fantastic for the office and great for business casual wear.

productName: ARIAT mens M4 Relaxed Solano Straight Jean
describe: STACKABLE: A modern take on a classic fit, these jeans are relaxed through the waist, hip and thigh for the most comfortable fit, all day long; Show off your boots with the stackable design, creating a perfect over-the-boot silhouette
productDescription: Ariat’s M4 bootcut jeans for men have a great fit and stretch for comfortable and flexible wear. They are crafted with a durable material that delivers long-lasting strength and maximum comfort while allowing you to move comfortably throughout the day. An Ariat favorite, these bootcut jeans feature the classic five pocket design for a timeless yet functional look. Their button closure with a zip fly allows for ease of wearing. The M4 jeans are designed by combining your modern needs with a classic style. They are relaxed through the hip and thigh for a fit that looks good on everyone.

productName: Ronhill Mens Tech Flex Pant
describe: Breathable |Made with breathable fabric that allows air to circulate and move freely throughout.
productDescription: Introducing our innovative new Flex pant: High spec, technical running leg wear that, wait for it; isn't a tight. The sweet spot of functionality that sits somewhere in-between a trouser and a tight has always been a bit of an obsession for us. Our often copied, but never bettered, classic tracksters live here - it's an area We deeply understand. The upper legs of the flex pant are constructed from an incredibly comfortable and lightweight stretch fabric, have quick access drop Pockets, secure zip pockets, and a soft flat waistband with a drawstring - a bit like your favorite running shorts. Below the articulated knees the tapered lower legs are closer fitting with great stretch - a little more like a tight. This 'best of both worlds' Design creates a versatile, specialist running pant that's perfect for Autumn and winter miles, and pre and post training sessions. Long zips mean they are easy to take off over trainers, and reflective strips help keep you visible and safe.

describe: Durable comfort stretch twill with natural touch
productDescription: Made with tough material, yet easy to move and stretch, Timberland PRO Work Pants feature durable fabrics, built-in articulation and pockets in all the right places. Workdays just got a little easier. Built on a tradition of craftsmanship and innovation, the Timberland PRO brand helps you conquer your work day. We know what you wear is as important as the tools you use. We also know that what's needed to get the job done is always changing, so our footwear and apparel are always evolving, engineered with technologies to proved the very best in comfort, durability and performance - all day long. While Timberland PRO Work Apparel looks great on the job, it's the details that make them really stand out. From moisture-wicking fabrics that feel great against the skin, to tagless neck labels and hidden cell phone pockets, we've built in quality from head to toe.

productName: ARIAT mens M2 Relaxed Fit Bootcut Jean
describe: STACKABLE BOOT CUT: Go-anywhere, do-anything denim, these bootcut jeans are relaxed through the waist, hip and thigh for the most comfortable fit, all day long. Show off your boots with the stackable design, creating a perfect over-the-boot silhouette.
productDescription: Ride, ranch or hit the town by wearing the M2 Boot Cut Jeans for men . Featuring a design that is relaxed through waist, hip, and thigh, these comfortable and durable western jeans are sure to create an authentic style statement. Made of ring-spun denim, these men’s jeans are machine washable using cold water and a light spin cycle. The boot cut design brings a modern twist to the classic fashion. These bootcut jeans feature anchored belt loops, no-rub inseams for rash-proof wearing comfort and are fitted with heavy-duty zippers and hardware. It has handcrafted pocket designs with embroidered stitching that add more character. These have a stackable design that lets you create over-the-boot silhouettes. Moreover, the extra-deep front pockets of these jeans make sure your belongings stay safe and secure.No matter what you need, there’s an Ariat product made for you. Ariat works with global suppliers to develop new material that is lighter, cooler and more durable than anything else in the market. Every product, from hiking and work boots to western casual wear and English riding gear, gets field tested with people like you, enabling us to consistently raise the bar for functionality and style.Ariat is committed to building a different breed of company, one that reflects our core values as a team and those of our consumers. Our company values have shaped our success since 1993 ― a commitment to innovation, quality, integrity, teamwork and respect.
customersSay: Customers like the fit and appearance of the pants. They mention that they're comfortable and still fit well.

productName: Portwest Modern
describe: PRODUCT USES: Stylish summer shorts, the modern knee-length style and contrasting trims have made these shorts a favorite for hot days.
productDescription: Portwest High-Visibility Clothing: Stay Visible, Stay Safe. Discover our extensive range of High-Visibility clothing designed to meet the most stringent requirements in design and construction. With a commitment to compliance with the latest EN ISO 20471 & ANSI standards, Portwest ensures that our High Visibility range offers optimal visibility and protection. Innovative and technical, our collection is ideal for those who refuse to compromise on style, comfort, and performance. As a global manufacturer and distributor of workwear, safetywear, and PPE, Portwest has been setting the industry standard since 1904. Our dedication to quality has driven us to become the fastest growing workwear company worldwide. With a global distribution network covering over 130 countries and a customer service staff ready to assist, we are committed to providing exceptional products to customers worldwide. Portwest High-Visibility Clothing is meticulously crafted to provide maximum visibility and safety in any environment. Whether you're working in low-light conditions, high-traffic areas, or hazardous environments, our garments offer enhanced visibility, giving you peace of mind on the job. With attention to detail and adherence to strict standards, our High-Visibility range guarantees your safety without compromising comfort or style. From high-visibility vests and jackets to coveralls and trousers, our collection offers a comprehensive range of options to suit your needs. Each garment is thoughtfully designed, using innovative materials and construction techniques to ensure durability and longevity. With Portwest, you can trust that your High-Visibility clothing will stand the test of time, keeping you safe and visible shift after shift.

describe: Exclusive sweatpants from Underground Printing, Printed and Designed in the USA. Unisex fit that's Perfect for Men and Women. Great addition to any wardrobe.
productDescription: Underground Printing is a national custom printed apparel provider, offering screenprinting and embroidery on a wide variety of apparel and promotional products. Founded in 2001, Underground offers high quality products, great prices, and unmatched service to customers large and small, from national retailers and Fortune 500 companies to local businesses and college student groups. Underground provides you with high quality screenprinted and embroidered products customized with your designs. We began with t-shirts (which continue to be our specialty), but they are only the beginning of what we offer for custom decoration. Hoodies, polos, pens, hats, frisbees, magnets, jerseys, sweats, and more - we do it all at Underground Printing. We have Underground Printing stores throughout the nation in the heart of the communities we serve, and that list of communities is growing rapidly. At Underground Printing, it's our goal to make your order process as convenient and hands-on as possible. If it's convenient, stop by one of our stores to place your order, or you can always give us a call or order online. Think we would be a good fit in your area? Let us know! All of our garment print production is done in our state-of-the-art 55,000 sq. ft. production facility and warehouse located in southeast Michigan. We utilize top of the line equipment to fulfill your orders in a wide variety of decoration methods: screenprinting, embroidery, digital printing, vinyl heat seal, and more. We are proud to be manufacturing in the good ole U.S. of A. Our technology and infrastructure allows us to provide the best quality, the lowest prices, and with the shortest turn-arounds in the industry. It is these traits that have propelled our growth, allowing us to be ranked in Impressions Magazine's Top 50 high-volume screenprinters for 6 years and among Inc. Magazine's 5000 fastest growing companies for 3 years running.

productName: Victorious Mens Straight Fit Color and Raw Denim Jeans
describe: Brand: Victorious
productDescription: Since the dawn of man, the straight-leg jean has stood the test of time and proven it's not going anywhere. Trends may come and go, but straight-leg jeans are here to stay. Great for any guy searching for that classic look.- Brand: Victorious- 100% Cotton, (Raw Denim: 90% Cotton, 7% Polyester, 3% Spandex)- Added stretch for maximum comfort (Raw Denim only)- Sits below waist, straight through thigh, straight leg- Classic five-pocket styling- Zipper fly, button closure- Machine-wash cold inside-out with like colors, line dry- Imported. Designed in Los AngelesRaw denim is basically untreated and unwashed after the dying process. The fabric is typically richer in color and is a little stiffer than treated denim. The advantage of raw denim is that in time, they will fade and wear in a natural an authentic way as they form to the individual's body. While factory distressing techniques achieve this look faster, they typically sacrifice the quality of the fabric and the unique individual look. Raw denim does require more care in washing but doing things more naturally is worth it.

productName: Under Armour Mens Unstoppable 7-Pocket Pants - Sweat Wicking Apparel 3836
describe: UA Microthread Fabric: This advanced fabric technology allows the pants to dry faster, preventing cling and chafe. You can stay active and comfortable all day long.
productDescription: Introducing the Under Armour Mens Unstoppable 7-Pocket Pants, the ultimate fusion of style, comfort, and functionality. These pants are designed for men who are always on the move, delivering exceptional performance in any situation. Whether you're heading to the gym, the office, or out for a casual day, these pants will exceed your expectations. The key feature of these pants is the UA Microthread fabric. This innovative material dries faster than conventional fabrics, so you won't have to worry about discomfort or chafing during your activities. Plus, it won't cling to your body, ensuring a comfortable fit at all times. The fabric also stretches without absorbing sweat, making these pants an ideal choice for workouts, sports, and outdoor activities. These pants also come with a performance knit fabric that combines the comfort and stretchability of a knit with the polished look and structure of a woven material. This unique blend makes these pants versatile enough to be worn anywhere, anytime. The material is also capable of wicking sweat and drying fast, keeping you cool and dry throughout the day. One of the standout features of these pants is their seven-pocket design. With open hand pockets, a zippered phone pocket, open back pockets, a hidden zip back pocket, and a left leg pocket, you'll have plenty of storage space for your essentials. The pants also have a stretch-engineered waistband for superior mobility and insane comfort. The pants are made from a blend of 55% Elastarell and 45% Polyester, ensuring durability and longevity. They also come with belt loops and a working fly for added convenience. The pants use a fluorine-free water repellent treatment, making them resistant to spills and stains. These pants come with a straight leg fit that can be worn cuffed or loose, according to your preference. They are machine washable and require no ironing, making them easy to care for

productName: Oxford - Original Approved AA Jeans Men's Outdoor Motorcycle Sports Pants
describe: Slim & Straight Fit, stretch comfort, flexible level 2 CE knee protectors
productDescription: For Oxford's Approved Denim, material innovation was a priority; performance denim built specifically for life on two wheels. From new yarn and fiber technologies to new finishes and dying techniques. After continuous testing, both in the lab and out on the road, we introduce Armourlite - highly durable denim that maintains a vintage look and softness; jeans you want to wear. To do this, we worked with skilled weavers and warpers to include a polyamide fiber into the weave - a hard-wearing material originally developed by the military for parachute cords. A two-way stretch was added to enhance mobility and comfort. We also included a quick dry technology which draws sweat and increases water repellency.

productDescription: Reebok is an American-inspired global brand with a deep fitness heritage and a clear mission: To be the best fitness brand in the world. Not an easy one. Sure, this is not the 1980s anymore – the world has moved on. But so has Reebok and it continues to be daring. Daring is knowing greatness doesn’t come from sameness. The past years have been characterized by a transformation from traditional sports to fitness. The three sides of the Reebok Delta, a symbol of change and transformation, represent the physical, mental and social changes that occur when individuals embrace the challenge of bettering themselves in the gym, in their lives and in the world.

productName: Viking Men's Professional Journeyman 300d Trilobal Waist Pants
describe: 100% Waterproof and windproof
productDescription: Since 1920 Viking wet weather gear has set the standard in quality for keeping workers safe, dry and comfortable. Viking products are market leaders in industrial rainwear, safety, mining boots, forestry boots and specialty work gloves. Viking continues to gain a greater degree of control over our products by integrating the back end of our supply chain. This allows us to get involved in every detail of the product, from the design of simple zippers & buttons, all the way to the development of the latest waterproof technology, all in an effort to deliver products that are practical, comfortable and of exceptional value. With these waterproof and windproof high-visibility work pants for men, the Viking heritage extends into a trusted selection of everyday high-tech, fashionable, protective safety gear. Viking focuses on safety—not as a guide, but as a philosophy, making sure their workwear exceeds the standards and embraces comfort and wellness for the wearer. 150 denier trilobal thread weave maximizes the ruggedness of the polyester/polyurethane fabric that makes up these pants, and the Vi-brance reflective tape pattern ensures you’ll be seen in inclement weather on the jobsite or the fishing boat. Wear Viking gear for all your work or recreational activities and enjoy the comfort and utility.

We also know that what's needed to get the job done is always changing, so our footwear and apparel are always evolving, engineered with technologies to proved the very best in comfort, durability and performance - all day long. Innovative and technical, our collection is ideal for those who refuse to compromise on style, comfort, and performance. As a global manufacturer and distributor of workwear, safetywear, and PPE, Portwest has been setting the industry standard since 1904. Our dedication to quality has driven us to become the fastest growing workwear company worldwide. With a global distribution network covering over 130 countries and a customer service staff ready to assist, we are committed to providing exceptional products to customers worldwide. Portwest High-Visibility Clothing is meticulously crafted to provide maximum visibility and safety in any environment. Whether you're working in low-light conditions, high-traffic areas, or hazardous environments, our garments offer enhanced visibility, giving you peace of mind on the job. With attention to detail and adherence to strict standards, our High-Visibility range guarantees your safety without compromising comfort or style. From high-visibility vests and jackets to coveralls and trousers, our collection offers a comprehensive range of options to suit your needs. Each garment is thoughtfully designed, using innovative materials and construction techniques to ensure durability and longevity. With Portwest, you can trust that your High-Visibility clothing will stand the test of time, keeping you safe and visible shift after shift.

productDescription: Buffalo creates fashionable clothing that defines you. These slim-cut jeans are perfect for casual workdays or nights out, are made from a high-quality fabric, and come in a wide variety of washes. These men’s pants feature a slim fit, 5 pockets, belt loops, a zipper fly, and single-button fastening.Wash these jeans only every 8–10 wears to help reduce your planet impact and extend their life. Machine wash in cold water with like colors. Do not bleach. Tumble dry on low or hang dry. Jeans using a natural indigo dye may bleed. Wear with care.At Buffalo, each piece of fashion we make moves us forward. Through a deep understanding of our product life cycle and our commitment to repurposing waste to make new fabrics and materials, we ensure that our garments contribute to supporting the world we live in.Buffalo was born of fashion in 1972. Since our beginnings in France, the birthplace of denim, our denim has always been a means of expression. We dress you from the “bottoms up” with the perfect fits, finest fabrics, and timeless washes while having a responsible impact. This is who we are. We are Denim.

productName: Joe's Men's The Dean
describe: Possibly the most comfortable slim-cut jeans you'll ever wear. The Dean in 'Edevane' has a tapered silhouette for an easy fit. The washed out grey shade is has been scoured with subtle hints of grey creating an uneven pattern that's complimented by the contrasting black thread.
productDescription: Timeless and stylish with the right touch of edgy urban flair, the Dean men’s slim tapered jeans combine looks and comfort. They can go from a casual day with friends to a night out on the town. With an updated classic style, our signature designer jeans look great no matter where you wear them. These slim stretch jeans create a confident look for those who want to make a statement without sacrificing comfort. Made from a high-quality fabric blend, our Dean jeans offer optimum stretch, all-day comfort, and an ideal fit. They have 5 classic-style pockets with ample room for your wallet and keys and a mid-rise belt-loop waistband with a 10 5/8-inch rise. These nice pants feature a zipper fly, rivets, a button closure, and 13-inch leg openings. The narrow cut and straight-legged style create a tailored silhouette. Available in multiple sizes and washes, these jeans are machine washable for elevated long-lasting style in any wardrobe. Joe’s Jeans delivers trendy, timeless denim for men and women with the latest technology and highest-quality materials to create beautiful jeans with a flawless fit.
customersSay: Customers like the fit and stretchability of the pants. They mention that they fit perfectly and are not skin tight. However, some customers have reported that the pants rip easily and lack durability.

describe: REGULAR FIT. Made with a regular fit throughout, these 10" work shorts are designed for warm-weather workdays. With an ultra-durable construction and a comfortable fit, these shorts can help get you through a long day.
productDescription: WRANGLER RIGGS WORKWEAR: Whatever the job, it’s time to step up. There’s nothing like an honest day’s work done in the right work clothes. Whether you’re a professional electrician, a hobbyist woodworker or construction worker, you’ll find our RIGGS WORKWEAR for men is designed with both comfort and utility in mind. We’ve designed clothes with a Room2Move Comfort for improved range of motion and have made sure that your clothes are tough enough to withstand anything with features like triple-needle stitching and added reinforcement in high-wear areas. Our Carpenter Jeans, Ripstop Cargo Pants, Ranger Pants and denim come in a variety of colors and a wide selection of men’s long-sleeve shirts, tees, jackets, vests and FR clothing offer versatile, everyday pieces that can be worn mowing the lawn, camping or on the job site. productName: Levi's Men's 501 Original Fit Jeans
describe: Regular Through The Thigh
productDescription: Raw, rough, and as pure as jeans can be, Shrink-to-Fit™ is the real deal. Before 1984, this was the only way you could get your jeans. Not washing them for 6 months and dragging them behind cars was all part of the breaking-in process. These are for all you denim purists who want to leave a mark—every crease, tiny hole, paint splatter, and fray will be your very own. If you plan to wash these jeans, order a larger size. For your waist, increase 1” for sizes 27-36”, 2” for 38-48”, and 3” for 50” and up. And for your inseam, increase 3” for 27-34” and 4” for 36” and up.
customersSay: Customers like the quality, look, and comfort of the pants. They mention they're well-made, hold up well to moderate abuse, and feel nice. Some also appreciate the value for money. productName: Gramicci Men's 32-Inch Original G Pant
describe: Abraision resistant, durable double ring spun closed end, stout weave cotton twill
productDescription: It's the early 1980s: MTV and stone-washed jeans; movies like Blade runner, Diner, and Ghandi ruled. Mike Graham, inspired by a love of surfing and climbing, launched Gramicci from his garage in Southern California. He designed the now-famous gusseted crotch and cinch/release belted G -Pant and G-Short that have become legend in the outdoor community. With grassroots efforts and word of mouth, the now cult-like following for Gramicci clothing began to grow. By the late 1990s, Gramicci was coveted for its unique fabrications, worn and weathered finishes, freedom of movement comfort, quality, and multiple functionality. Years later, Gramicci is still dedicated to creating garment dyed, worn-and-weathered clothing built for the sport of living. Forever paying homage to the original designs launched over two decades ago, the company's design team is always busy dreaming about the next generation of Gramicci. With a strong foundation, Gramicci is committed to developing new, natural technology and innovative designs each season.

productName: Portwest BZ31 Bizweld Flame Resistant Cargo Pants Navy, Large
productDescription: Portwest Flame Resistant Range: Unparalleled Protection for Hazardous Environments. Experience industry-leading flame-resistant protection with our comprehensive range, designed to provide multi-standard safety in hazardous environments. These state-of-the-art products are the result of years of experience, advanced technology, and extensive market research. Portwest's unwavering commitment to the health, safety, and comfort of the wearer is evident in our wide range of products suitable for all climates and end uses. As a global manufacturer and distributor of workwear, safetywear, and PPE, Portwest has been setting the industry standard since 1904. Our dedication to excellence has propelled us to become the fastest growing workwear company worldwide. With a global distribution network spanning over 130 countries and a dedicated customer service staff, we ensure that our products are readily available to customers around the globe. The Portwest Flame Resistant Range is meticulously crafted to provide unparalleled protection in hazardous environments. Our products adhere to multiple safety standards, ensuring optimal safety for the wearer. We understand the importance of comfort in demanding work conditions, which is why our range is designed to be both protective and comfortable, allowing you to focus on the task at hand. From flame-resistant coveralls and jackets to shirts and trousers, our collection offers a wide range of options to suit various industry requirements. Each garment is crafted using cutting-edge technology, advanced fabrics, and precision construction techniques to ensure maximum safety, durability, and performance. Portwest's commitment to health, safety, and comfort is unwavering. Our flame-resistant range is meticulously designed and rigorously tested to deliver the highest standards of protection, while maintaining comfort and functionality. No matter the climate or end use, our products provide peace of mind and confidence on the job.

productName: Walker and Hawkes - Men's Derby Tweed Leighton Suit Trousers
describe: Durable - tweed is woven extremely tight so is very durable. It can be bent over 20,000 times without breaking.
productDescription: A wardrobe staple which you'll be reaching for time and time again. Whether in the town or country - our Leighton Trousers will surely be part of the entourage. Expertly cut using our durable Derby Tweed. Expertly crafted in the U.K. with our 20 years experience developing tweed garments. We are confident the Leighton Trousers will fulfil the demands of any stylish and active outdoorsman. Our Tweed is twill woven. Twill is a type of textile weave with the yarns packed very closely together, making it thick and tightly woven - resulting in a durable fabric which can withstand wear and tear. This type of weaving can be made in a multi-tone pattern, which has diagonal parallel ribs. The tweed is spun yarn, making it softer and less prone to snagging. We have also treated the tweed with a Teflon fabric protector. This works like a protective barrier around each fibre of the fabric to help fend off water, dirt and stains - all while not affecting the fabric's weight, look, feel, colour, or breathability. Available in Light Sage and Dark Sage, these trousers are a perfect companion for nights out in the town or days out in the field. Designed with a classic and regular fit, the Leighton Trousers work great as part of a full Derby Tweed ensemble. Our formal set, including the Windsor Blazer and Alcott Waistcoat, will grant a rugged yet sophisticated look. For those more active days in the field - combine it with our Barrington Gilet and Barlaston Shooting Jacket for full protection from the elements. Top off the look with our range of tweed caps and hats. Accurately measure yourself and refer to our size guide to receive the great fit you expect from a Walker & Hawkes product. Dry-clean or hand-wash to preserve the quality of your garment.

describe: First G-Star RAW 3D denim design. Features the same 3D construction as the original and is made from a soft stretch denim
productDescription: The 5620 G-Star Elwood was first introduced in 1996, and is the original design from the G-Star 3D Denim approach to construction. Head Designer Pierre Morisset pioneered this method as he sought to recreate the jeans of a passing motorcyclist, which had moulded to his legs from longtime exposure to the elements. With angled seams, workwear pockets, and reinforced knees, these jeans are designed for elevated style and function. Not only do they look and feel great, but you can also wear them with confidence knowing they’re made with recycled polyester and sustainable cotton from the Better Cotton Initiative, which reduces their environmental impact. A fitted waistband and skinny pant legs allow our jeans for men to easily form to your body while the zipper closure adds convenience. G-Star Raw’s 5620 3D Skinny Fit Jeans are machine washable; do not bleach.

Consider it your wardrobe staple for any and every occasion.- Brand: Victorious- 90% Cotton, 7% Polyester, 3% Spandex- Added stretch for maximum comfort- Sits below waist, slim through thigh, tapered leg- Classic five-pocket styling- Zipper fly, button closure- Machine-wash cold inside-out with like colors, line dry- Imported. Designed in Los AngelesRaw denim is basically untreated and unwashed after the dying process. The fabric is typically richer in color and is a little stiffer than treated denim. The advantage of raw denim is that in time, they will fade and wear in a natural an authentic way as they form to the individual's body. While factory distressing techniques achieve this look faster, they typically sacrifice the quality of the fabric and the unique individual look. Raw denim does require more care in washing but doing things more naturally is worth it.
